Uses of Class
avdta.network.node.IntersectionControl

  • Packages that use IntersectionControl 
    Package Description
    avdta.network.node  
    avdta.network.node.policy  

    • Uses of IntersectionControl in avdta.network.node

      Subclasses of IntersectionControl in avdta.network.node 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Diverge
      This class implements the diverge intersection control at a node.
      class  Highway 
      class  IPTBR
      This class solves the conflict region integer program by calling CPLEX.
      class  Merge
      This class implements Merge intersection control at a node.
      class  PhasedTBR
      This is a version of reservations in which vehicles with a green light get priority.
      class  PriorityTBR
      This class represents a reservation-based intersection control in which Vehicle movement is determined by their priority.
      class  StopSign
      This class represents a stop sign intersection control.
      class  TBR
      This is an abstract representation of reservation-based intersection control.
      class  TrafficSignal
      This class implements traffic signals at intersections (Node) of a network.
      Methods in avdta.network.node that return IntersectionControl 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IntersectionControl Intersection.getControl()
      Returns the IntersectionControl controlling this Intersection
      Methods in avdta.network.node with parameters of type IntersectionControl 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Intersection.setControl(IntersectionControl c)
      Updates the control on this Intersection
      Constructors in avdta.network.node with parameters of type IntersectionControl 
      Constructor and Description
      Intersection(int id, IntersectionControl control)
      Instantiates Intersection with Location (0, 0) and specified control.
      Intersection(int id, Location loc, IntersectionControl control)
      Instantiates Intersection with specified control.

    • Uses of IntersectionControl in avdta.network.node.policy

      Subclasses of IntersectionControl in avdta.network.node.policy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MCKSTBR
      A heuristic to solve the multiple constraint knapsack problem applied to the IP for conflict region model.
      class  SignalWeightedTBR
      This class implements a signal-weighted reservations.
